item.title: Apache InLong 0.11.0
item.description: Apache InLong (incubating) has been renamed from the original Apache TubeMQ (incubating) from 0.9.0. With the name change, InLong has also been upgraded from a single message queue to a one-stop data integration solution. InLong supports data collection, aggregation, caching, and sorting, users can import data from the data source to the real-time computing engine or land to offline storage with a simple configuration.
